messages.subject: NEW WEBSITE DISCOVERY???
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.okamotocorp.co.jp/english/okamoto_story/history/01.html The Okamoto Corp would appear to be a major manufacturer of socks in Japan.  They have both
messages.messageBody:
http://www.okamotocorp.co.jp/english/okamoto_story/history/01.html


The Okamoto Corp would appear to be a major manufacturer of socks in Japan. They have both an English and Japanese site. I found it somewhat convoluted when I went to the website root and tried to open the link above, but I discovered the link above in an unrelated search. There is quite a bit of history about the samurai and clothing.

Best regards,
Barry Thomas
(Melbourne, Australia)

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
